page.title: 06TRADE
page.content: Some of the trade is around the Longbridge area where there is British Leyland and a factory which makes cars such as Metro, Maestros and Montegos there is also a large area of shops in this or consisting os small buisnesses like newsagents and small asian supermarkets. Around West Heath where there is a large area of shops including some supermarkets and a large chemist. Also there are two newsagents and a video shop. There is also a pub and a betting shop. Around the area there a few garges and petrol stations. Most Asian owners close there shops late and open on most bank holidays. Most of the English owners close at about six o'clock and only open for about one or two hours, but mainly do not open.
